channel.title: Help me!
channel.description: okay, I have a source, a client and everything.. except a run file that will make the server go online... I kinda stole a source from a Private server I never play'd on, and I just now noticed that it didn't have a runserver.bat thing or whatever you want to call it..and I really need one.. I need one that will work with [IMG]http://i360.photobucket.com/albums/oo47/perez048/asdf.jpg[/img] kind of files... the server will be real cool, but I can't find out how to get it on without one of them.. and Idon't know how to make one.. I know you can, just.. don't knwo how too.. plz help

item.title: Help me!
item.dc:creator: @gamerbug gamerbug
item.description:
@gamerbug wrote:

well there are like, main, client, GUI, sprite frame, ect…
idk maybe, but I’m just talkin I need a run file to make the server start…

Read full topic
